channel.description: Recent content in markdown on onkarsingh website

item.title: Coronovirus in India_Dashboard
item.description: Summary Row confirmed valueBox( value = paste(format(sum(df$confirmed), big.mark = ","), "", sep = " "), caption = "Total confirmed cases", icon = "fas fa-user-md", color = confirmed_color ) 14,352 death valueBox( value = paste(format(sum(df$death, na.rm = TRUE), big.mark = ","), " (", round(100 * sum(df$death, na.rm = TRUE) / sum(df$confirmed), 1), "%)", sep = "" ), caption = "Death cases (death rate)", icon = "fas fa-heart-broken", color = death_color ) 486 (3.
